item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in and around New Haven.

This week's location is:

The Southport Brewing Company in Branford, CT

850 West Main Street
Branford, CT 06405
203-481-2739
www.southportbrewing.com

SBC is a great local restaurant and brewery that specializes in traditional pub/American food and has over 20 original micro-brews available at different times throughout the year.

Happy Hour specials from 6pm-9pm:

$2.50 house draft beers (9 micro-brew varieties to choose from!)
$3 well Smirnoff drinks
$5 martinis
$3 miller high life

In addition, there will be a food menu with a variety of items for only $5.00 available to us that evening.

Contact: Jeanie (860) 942-4708

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. EVER.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour at SBC in Branford
